Articles.Content:
Ok, so heres a real challenge: (unless its already been done)

Create a frigate that launches.. flies thru space.. lands on DUNA, and has to relaunch again back into SPACE.. but its got to land on its SIDE. Kind of like the Pegasus Mod but with STOCK PARTS!! Also for added challenge and to give this Frigate a Purpose, a vessel must detach from the ship in sort of a docking bay. This can be a simple rover or escape pod.

WINNER IS DETERMINED BY:

The ship MUST have a landing/docking bay.

With a detachable vessel upon landing.

Ship must escape the planet and return to space.

MAX 12K FUEL TO START, THE MOST REMAINING UPON EXIT OF PLANET IS THE WINNER.

STOCK PARTS ONLY

-----------

ANYONE HAVE PICTURES OF THIS??

Mine is still a work in progress but would love to see some!

Edited May 24, 2013 by korntipton
satisfaction of a completed vehicle that successfully launches flies and lands and you can take it anywhere.. all purpose
oh my bad guys.. sorry new at this.. updating now.
